text.code: const lines = variables['0fd98617-834e-4c9b-941b-8b853350cd9d'] || []; const positiveVariance = lines.filter(line => (line.variance || 0) > 0).length; return wwFormulas.toText(positiveVariance)

_ww-text_text.code: const lines = variables['0fd98617-834e-4c9b-941b-8b853350cd9d'] || []; const positiveVariance = lines.filter(line => (line.variance || 0) > 0).length; return wwFormulas.toText(positiveVariance)

text.code: const lines = variables['0fd98617-834e-4c9b-941b-8b853350cd9d'] || []; const negativeVariance = lines.filter(line => (line.variance || 0) < 0).length; return wwFormulas.toText(negativeVariance)

_ww-text_text.code: const lines = variables['0fd98617-834e-4c9b-941b-8b853350cd9d'] || []; const negativeVariance = lines.filter(line => (line.variance || 0) < 0).length; return wwFormulas.toText(negativeVariance)

text.code: const stocktake = variables['be58d869-9a44-4023-b359-ec8d6372734b']; const summary = formulas['f2acab99-7f41-42fe-85d3-2cb3f21b7d3b'](); return `This stocktake covers ${summary.totalItems} items in ${stocktake?.location || 'Unknown Location'}. ${summary.countedItems} items have been counted with ${summary.varianceItems} items showing variance.`

_ww-text_text.code: const stocktake = variables['be58d869-9a44-4023-b359-ec8d6372734b']; const summary = formulas['f2acab99-7f41-42fe-85d3-2cb3f21b7d3b'](); return `This stocktake covers ${summary.totalItems} items in ${stocktake?.location || 'Unknown Location'}. ${summary.countedItems} items have been counted with ${summary.varianceItems} items showing variance.`

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(100%); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

text.code: const variance = context.item.data?.variance || 0; return variance > 0 ? `+${variance}` : variance.toString()

_ww-text_color.code: const variance = context.item.data?.variance || 0; return variance > 0 ? 'var(--9c64690c-026c-4253-9213-82dc41573575, #10b981)' : variance < 0 ? 'var(--bc48a6fa-f8af-47e8-9981-2bb6730e6873, #ef4444)' : 'var(--38c15cad-b7eb-4218-8a16-f105220766f2, #4b5563)'

interactions.description: Updates a specific stocktake line item with new counted quantity, calculates variance, and updates status based on whether there's a variance. Ensures row-specific data integrity.

text.code: const stocktake = variables['be58d869-9a44-4023-b359-ec8d6372734b']; if (!stocktake) return 'No stocktake selected'; const date = new Date(stocktake.startedAt).toLocaleDateString(); return `Created on ${date} by ${stocktake.createdBy || 'Unknown'} • Location: ${stocktake.location || 'Unknown'}`;

backgroundColor.code: const variance = context.item.data?.variance || 0; if (variance > 0) return 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.05)'; if (variance < 0) return 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.05)'; return 'transparent'

text.code: const status = variables['be58d869-9a44-4023-b359-ec8d6372734b']?.status; return status === 'completed' ? 'Completed' : status === 'in_progress' ? 'In Progress' : 'Draft'

2645d064-0da3-44e9-a7fb-b331bbf2bdb6.code:
const type = context.component?.props?.['type'] || context.component?.variables?.['popupType'] || 'default'
    if (type === 'delete') return 'lucide/trash-2'
    if (type === 'approve') return 'lucide/check-circle'
    if (type === 'warning') return 'lucide/alert-triangle'
    return 'lucide/help-circle'
